page.title: 19Horsmonden Horse Fair
page.content: From the Kent & Sussex Courier, 12th. July, 1985: "The Horsmonden Gipsy Horse Fair which for the past two years has taken place in Paddock Wood may in future be at the County Show Ground at Detling. The Fair, which has been an annual event for about 200 years, is due to take place on September 8th. So far, no definite venue has been fixed. Mr. Tom Lee, Welfare Officer of the Romany Guild who organises the Fair, wrote to local Councils asking for their co-operation in finding a permanent site. "We just want to find a home for the Horse Fair in the South of England," Mr. Lee said. "Some people want to go back to Horsmonden, the traditional home of the Horse Fair, but we want to avoid confrontation."
